title: pAlanai purivadOr
sahitya:
pAlanai(nam) purivadOr bhAramA paramashivA pArvatIpatE ennaip-


anupallavi

  hAlam amudena uNDakhilaaNDam ANDavan nIyanrO aDimai ennai


caraNam    mU-vinaiyum piravit-taLaiyum aruttu jIvan muktiyaLikkum muzhu mudal kadavuLE
tIvinai viLai nilam enrenait-taLLinAl tiruvarut-kazhagalla enakkumOr pughalillai
